author: Molly Taft, Casey Johnston
title: Gyms Won't Let Customers Cancel Memberships Despite Stay-at-Home Orders
description: Multiple fitness chains are charging extra fees during pandemic closures, and some are making it even more difficult than usual to leave contracts.
content: Sarah Dabous went to her New York Sports Club gym in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn in late February to cancel her membership before heading back to college in Staten Island. She didnt have time to go to the gym between work and classes, she said, and wasnt a fan of the… [+6997 chars]
